data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of North-East an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of North-East, Singapore

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of North-East, Singapore to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 14 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 908,500 souls living in the state of North-East with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in North-East, Singapore, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of North-East
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 64,691 believers in North-East to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 843,809 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in North-East, Singapore a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.
